Detailed Description

Thanks : Robert Godin, Rokia Missaoui, Hassan Alaoui.
  • http://www.labunix.uqam.ca/~godin_r/compint95.pdf
  • http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Formal_concept_analysis
Author:
Jean Sapristi
Date:
31 janvier 2012

Function Documentation

PIZGaloisLattice* pizGaloisLatticeNew ( long  argc,
long *  argv 
)

Create the lattice.

The function accept one argument : the threshold to start killing nodes. Minimum is 1, maximum is 100, default is 50. In case of failure the pointer is NULL.

Parameters:
argc The number of arguments.
argv A pointer to arguments.
Returns:
A pointer to the new lattice.
Remarks:
The following shows how to create a lattice. 
 long args = 75;

 PIZFiniteState *fsa = pizFiniteStateNew (1, &args);
 PIZFiniteState *fsa = pizFiniteStateNew (0, NULL); // default value

void pizGaloisLatticeFree ( PIZGaloisLattice *  x  ) 

Free the lattice.

It is safe to pass NULL pointer.

Parameters:
x A Pointer.

long  argc,
long *  argv

void pizGaloisLatticeClear ( PIZGaloisLattice *  x  ) 

Clear the lattice.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.

PIZError pizGaloisLatticeProceed ( PIZGaloisLattice *  x,
long  argc,
long *  argv 
)

Fill a given array with lattice values.

Remarks:
While the array is not full, playback head randomly moves in the lattice getting values from concepts.
Parameters:
argc Number of values to proceed.
argv Pointer to the array to fill.
Returns:
An error code.

long pizGaloisLatticeCount ( const PIZGaloisLattice *  x  ) 

Get the number of concepts in the lattice.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
Returns:
The number of concepts.

PIZError pizGaloisLatticeEncodeConceptsToArray ( const PIZGaloisLattice *  x,
long  n,
PIZGrowingArray *  a 
)

Encode all concepts with a given size to a dynamic array.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
n The size of concepts.
a A pointer to a dynamic array.
Returns:
An error code.
Remarks:
An example : 
 long             err = PIZ_GOOD;
 long             n = 4;
 PIZGrowingArray  *a = pizGrowingArrayNew (16);

 err = pizGaloisLatticeEncodeConceptsToArray (lattice, n, a);

 if (!err)
      {
          long i;
          long count = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (a, PIZ_GALOIS_LATTICE_ENCODE_CONCEPTS);
          long *ptr  = pizGrowingArrayPtr (a);
          long *values = NULL;

          for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                  values = ptr + PIZ_GALOIS_LATTICE_ENCODE_DATA + (n * i);
              }
      }

  pizGrowingArrayFree (a);
